content: As an AI language model, I don't require sleep or perform actions, so I don't have personal preference regarding this matter. Most people may benefit from meditating in the morning because it can help start the day in a calm and centered state, and set a positive tone for the rest of the day. However, meditating before bed can also help relax the mind and body, reducing stress and improving sleep quality. Ultimately, whichever time you choose, consistency is key. Choose a time that works best for you and establish a routine, so you can reap the benefits of regular meditation practice.
